news.title: Navi Mumbai civic body urges residents of buildings without OCs to apply
news.para: ​​Following the Bombay high court's directives on a Public Interest Litigation and a subsequent Writ Petition, NMMC created a detailed catalogue of non-compliant buildings after an extensive survey.

news.title: No data with Gurugram civic body on 34 defaulters with ₹97 crore property tax dues
news.para: Without the details of the owners, there is little action that the corporation can take to collect this property tax, the principal accountant general pointed out in the report for the audit carried out this Feb.

news.title: BMC slashes Worli tower cost by ₹37 crore as Mumbai activist questions expense
news.para: ​After cancelling the original Rs 525-crore tender, BMC issued a fresh Rs 488-crore tender in May. The biggest cost cut was in the robotic parking system — from Rs 96 crore to Rs 72 crore.

news.title: Fire NOC validity extended to five years in Goa, but experts sceptical
news.para: This, however, has authorities worried as experience shows that many commercial establishments do not maintain firefighting equipment. Recently, the fire department found that the fire prevention mechanism at the Panaji municipal market was defunct.

news.title: Allottees selling off industry plots along Yamuna Expressway for quick profits
news.para: According to officials, a recent survey revealed several cases where allottees, instead of setting up factories, engaged in property trading, undermining the objective of job creation and industrial growth.

news.title: Land pooling offers 10-fold returns to farmers: Lucknow development body VC
news.para: During the inspection, Kumar directed officials to fast-track sector development works and ensure that landowners are made aware of the significant benefits of land pooling.

news.title: Pune civic body razes illegal structures in funnel zone after Ahmedabad crash
news.para: The civic body launched its action against illegal constructions in the vicinity of the airport from Tuesday. Structures spread over 48,000sqft were demolished in two days.

news.title: Ranchi: 70,000 property owners yet to pay holding tax
news.para: Out of the Rs 83 crore holding tax that was to be received by the RMC, Rs 80.64 crore holding tax was paid by the 1.67 crore domestic and business property holders till March 31 this year, the civic body added.

news.title: Nagpur civic body zones sit on list of unsafe buildings for a month
news.para: ​The lists, meant to reach the Fire and Emergency Services Department before the onset of monsoon, were submitted almost a month late, pushing back urgent actions like demolition, evacuation and public warnings.

news.title: Lucknow: Lottery draw for 744 PMAY units held amidst protest over preference norm
news.para: Confusion prevailed among the applicants during the initial phase as the authority held a draw for the applicants who had shown interest in making upfront payment to the housing board while delaying the draw for the applicants who wanted to pay the amount as per monthly instalments.

news.title: GIFT City, Gujarat RERA likely to opt for new entity to complete stalled WTC project
news.para: The authorities are now exploring options including allowing the association of allottees to take over the project or bringing in a substitute entity to ensure completion in order to protect the investors whose funds remain locked in the stalled project.

news.title: Information boards a must at all real estate projects: Tamil Nadu RERA
news.para: "The circular outlines the essential information that must be displayed on these boards: name of the promoter, project name, TNRERA registration details, date of completion as per TNRERA registration, and the website address of TNRERA," TNRERA member, M Krishnamoorthy.

news.title: BMC auctions south Mumbai market plot for 13% less than ₹428 crore base price
news.para: ​Accepting the Rs 369-crore bid, BMC has asked AAV Developers to leave space for a staircase, lift and escalators for a foot over-bridge (FOB) that railways plan to build to connect the east-west of CSMT station and access to long-distance nodes from Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Mandai.

news.title: New home sales in USA fall 13.7% in May 2025
news.para: The larger-than-expected decline in sales reported by the Commerce Department on Wednesday added to weak homebuilding and tepid sales of previously owned homes last month in suggesting that housing would subtract from gross domestic product in the second quarter after being neutral in the January-March quarter.

news.title: Signature Global plans to raise ₹875 crore through debentures
news.para: In a regulatory filing on Wednesday, Signature Global informed that the Board has approved the raising of funds by issuance of secured listed redeemable non-convertible debentures (NCDs) for an amount not exceeding Rs 875 crore on private placement basis, in one or more series/ tranches.

news.title: Union cabinet nod for phase-II of Pune metro, to cost ₹3,626 crore
news.para: The Union Cabinet, at a meeting chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, approved the two corridors under Phase 2 of the Pune Metro Rail Project -- Vanaz to Chandani Chowk and Ramwadi to Wagholi -- as extensions of the existing Vanaz-Ramwadi corridor under Phase 1.

news.title: MMRDA greenlights ₹12,000 crore for major metro projects, boosting Mumbai’s urban mobility
news.para: ​To ensure smooth last-mile connectivity, MMRDA sanctioned Rs 535 crore for multi-modal integration across 32 Metro stations on Lines 4 and 4A.

news.title: Kalpataru IPO subscribed 35% on day 2 of bidding
news.para: Retail Individual Investors (RIIs) part got subscribed 72 per cent, while the non-institutional investors category received 45 per cent subscription. The quota for Qualified Institutional Buyers (QIBs) fetched 17 per cent subscription.
